content: Once your booking is confirmed, your Tokyo Skytree skip-the-line Reserved Ticket is secured for the selected time and date
Receive your QR code voucher by email up to 30 days before the day of your visit
Your QR code voucher is valid for entry to Tokyo Skytree only at the date and time you selected when booking
On the day of your visit, enter the facility through the Main Entrance via the 4F Sky Arena
Exchange your QR code voucher for a physical ticket at the 4F Entrance Floor Ticket Counter (10:00â€“20:00)
